content: Note:  Two-year rolling regressions of the weekly excess holding returns to a 10-Year Treasury note versus the S&P  500 stock index. CAPM is capital asset pricing model.  Source:  Federal Reserve Board staff calculations.  -0.4  -0.2  0.0  0.2  0.4  0.6  0.8  1990 1992 1994 1996 1998 2000 2002 2004 2006 2008 2010 2012 2014 2016  Figure A.1:  CAPM Beta for the 10-Year Nominal Treasury Security
